description:
Fundamentals of Spatial Analysis
+ PySAL Overview
+ Spatial data processing
+ Choropleth mapping and geovisualization
+ Spatial weights
+ Global & Local spatial autocorrelation

Applied Spatial Analysis: Neighborhoods
+ Clustering/Geodemographic Analysis
+ Segregation Analysis

Expected level of knowledge: Intermediate

Goals:
- learn fundamentals of processing geospatial data in Python
- develop skills in geovisualization and exploratory spatial data analysis
- explore applications of spatial data to urban segregation and neighborhood equity

https://github.com/sjsrey/pysal-scipy22/blob/main/README.md
title: Spatial and Urban Data Science with PySAL
